mapper.select: SELECT serialId, useDate, bootType, mode, cure_stress, start_stress, delay_time, min_stress, max_stress, tidalVolume, max_inhaleStress, min_inhaleStress, exhale_stress, inhale_stress, respiratory_rate, inhale_time, exhale_release, inhale_sensitivity, exhale_sensitivity, stress_up, stress_down, avaps, soft_version FROM sys_device_set s WHERE s.serialId = #{serialId} AND s.useDate =#{seleceTime} ORDER BY s.useDate DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_device_set ( serialId, useDate, bootType, mode, cure_stress, start_stress, delay_time, min_stress, max_stress, tidalVolume, max_inhaleStress, min_inhaleStress, exhale_stress, inhale_stress, respiratory_rate, inhale_time, exhale_release, inhale_sensitivity, exhale_sensitivity, stress_up, stress_down, avaps, soft_version ) VALUES ( #{serialId}, #{useDate}, #{bootType}, #{mode}, #{cureStress}, #{startStress}, #{delayTime}, #{minStress}, #{maxStress}, #{tidalVolume}, #{maxInhaleStress}, #{minInhaleStress}, #{exhaleStress}, #{inhaleStress}, #{respiratoryRate}, #{inhaleTime}, #{exhaleRelease}, #{inhaleSensitivity}, #{exhaleSensitivity}, #{stressUp}, #{stressDown}, #{avaps}, #{softVersion} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE bootType =#{bootType}, mode=#{mode}, cure_stress=#{cureStress}, start_stress=#{startStress}, delay_time=#{delayTime}, min_stress=#{minStress}, max_stress=#{maxStress}, tidalVolume=#{tidalVolume}, max_inhaleStress=#{maxInhaleStress}, min_inhaleStress=#{minInhaleStress}, exhale_stress=#{exhaleStress}, inhale_stress=#{inhaleStress}, respiratory_rate=#{respiratoryRate}, inhale_time=#{inhaleTime}, exhale_release=#{exhaleRelease}, inhale_sensitivity=#{inhaleSensitivity}, exhale_sensitivity=#{exhaleSensitivity}, stress_up=#{stressUp}, stress_down=#{stressDown}, avaps=#{avaps}, soft_version=#{softVersion}
